name: hydrochloride
sulfate
FoodContactSubstance: Poly(N-vinylformamide), 20-100 percent hydrolyzed, chloride or sulfate salts. The FCS is specifically known as one of the following: a) formamide, N-ethenyl-, polymer with ethanamine, hydrochloride (CAS Reg. No. 111616-55-8); b) formamide, N-ethenyl-, polymer with ethanamine, sulfate (CAS Reg. No. 117985-59-8); and c) formamide, ethenyl-, homopolymer, hydrolyzed, hydrochlorides, (CAS Reg. No. 183815-54-5).
